Detailed Description

Handles creation and modification of the index.db file.

MapIndex::MapIndex (  const char *  mapPath  ) 
 

Constructor.

Existing index will be overwritten if not loaded before saving.

void MapIndex::addMapNotices (  map< MC2String, uint32 >  mapIDByName,
const map< MC2String, MC2String > &  higherMapByLowerMap
)  [private]
 

Adds map notices for underview and overview maps, or overview and super overview maps.

Parameters:
higherMapByLowerMap A STL::map with map IDs as strings. In case of underview and overview maps, the overview maps are considered higher, in case of super overview and overview maps, super overview maps are considered higher.

void MapIndex::printMapSupNode (  const MapModuleNoticeContainer::mapSupCoverage_t &  mapSupCov,
uint32  idx,
const multimap< uint32, pair< uint32, uint32 > > &  mapSupCovTree,
uint32  level
)  [private]
 

Print the content of a map supplier node to standard out.

Intended for recursive calls.

Parameters:
mapSupCov All map suppler boxes.
idx Index in mapSupCov of the box to print.
mapSupCovTree The tree of supplier boxes.
level The current level in the tree.

void MapIndex::save (   ) 
 

Save index.

void MapIndex::setMapSupCoverage (  MapModuleNoticeContainer::mapSupCoverage_t &  mapSupCov,
MapModuleNoticeContainer::coverageTree_t &  coverageTree
) 
 

Set the map supplier coverage data.

Complete map supplier coverage data. Any present data is replaced. Tells what coverage areas include other coverage areas. Parent mapped to child, a child is smaller than a parent.

void MapIndex::setMapSupNames (  MapModuleNoticeContainer::mapSupNamesByMapSup_t  mapSupNamesByMapSup  ) 
 

Set the map supplier name info.

Parameters:
mapSupNamesByMapSup An STL map with map supplier as key and its names in different languages as value.

bool MapIndex::updateCreationTimes (   ) 
 

Updates the creation times stored index.db and the country maps.

Parameters:
onlyPerformCheck Optional parameter that if specified indicates that no actual update will be performed.
Returns:
True if any creation times were updated.

Definition at line 158 of file MapIndex.h.

mapSupsByCountry_t MapIndex::m_mapSupsByCountry [private]
 

Includes map supplier for all countries included in the index.

Only filled in when adding regions to the index.

Used by map supplier coverage bounding box check.
